Name: Music video gig
Description: This type connects music videos and people who have worked on them in a variety of roles.

Properties.Name: Crew member
Properties.Description: Person who worked on the music video production (lighting, set designer, gaffer, etc.)  in this role

Properties.Name: Music video
Properties.Description: Music video this crew member worked on the production in (EG., as a gaffer for Thriller).

Properties.Name: Music video crew production role
Properties.Description: The specific role the music video crew member fulfilled in the production (EG. Set artist for "Love My Way")
